title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Designate and Appoint Personnel to Key Administration Posts – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
April 24, 2018
President Donald J. Trump today announced his intent to designate the following individual to a key position in his Administration:Jeffrey Gerrish of Maryland, to be Acting President of the Export-Import Bank. —President Donald J. Trump today announced his intent to appoint the following individuals to key positions in his Administration:Lisa Nelson of Virginia to be a member of the President’s Commission on White House Fellowships.Philip J. Montante Jr. of New York to be a member of the President’s Commission on White House Fellowships.Justin J. Sayfie of Florida to be a member of the President’s Commission on White House Fellowships.
